question: Which Indian state has been placed at top spot by the World Bank in Energy Efficiency Implementation Readiness?
explanation: Andhra Pradesh has been placed at the top spot by the World Bank in Energy Efficiency Implementation Readiness Index. Rajasthan and Karnataka hold the second and third position. AP achieved an overall score of 42.01 followed by Rajasthan-41.89, Karnataka-39.34 and Maharashtra-39.29.
